attributes.comment:
To Whom It May Concern -

I am an international adoptive parent and, hopefully, will adopt additional
international children. I am writing to let you know that I strongly oppose the
proposed increase in
fees. The wait time to adopt is long and often the paperwork for the USCIS needs
to be filed (and paid) 2-3x before an adoption is completed. Increasing the fees
only adds insult to injury. I know this is a sweeping legislation for most USCIS
documents but I would urge you to exempt adoptive paperwork from your fee increases.

Sincerely -

Heather Kaminski

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Heather Kaminski
